temples.Name: Winter Quarters Nebraska Temple
temples.address: 8283 N 34th St Omaha NE 68112 United States
temples.history: The Winter Quarters Temple was announced on the 14th of June 1999. Work began on the 28th of November 1999 and was dedicated the 22nd of April 2001.
temples.ordinanceSchedule: All sessions and ordinances are currently by appointment only. Visit the temple website below to see times and schedule.

temples.Name: Oakland California Temple
temples.address: 4770 Lincoln Ave. Oakland CA 94602-2535 United States
temples.history: The Oakland Temple was announced on the 23rd of January 1961. Work began on the 26th of May 1962 and was dedicated the 17th of November 1964.
temples.ordinanceSchedule: All sessions and ordinances are currently by appointment only. Visit the temple website below to see times and schedule.

temples.ordinanceSchedule: All sessions and ordinances are currently by appointment only. Visit the temple website below to see times and schedule.
